Hero Image/Video

Looking for unforgettable live music for your venue or special occasion?

Tilt Mode delivers a high-energy, crowd-pleasing show packed with rock-infused versions of the songs everyone loves — from 90s classics to modern hits.

With powerful vocals, tight harmonies, and a professional setup, they’ll have guests of all ages singing along and dancing all night.

Whether it’s a birthday bash, corporate event, or big celebration, Tilt Mode guarantees a night to remember.

What we offer

Available for bookings across South East England.


Availability

Weekends, evenings & select weekdays. Advance bookings preferred.


Set times

Option of either 45 mins, 90mins (2x 45mins) or 120mins (2 x 60mins) sets


We Provide

Full PA system, lighting rig & setup crew — all you need is the space!


Options

DJ playlist between sets, customised sets first dance request
